this 'challenge is VERY simple. build a crazy only just controllable (must be in the AIR for at least 60 seconds) plane.

now of course there are a set of rules.

RULES

-------

1) must be crazy

2) all modes allowed (for more...awsomeness)

Like I said its very simple and easy(ish)

now to the scoring.

HOW TO POINT

---------------

1) the better it looks the more points (i will determine your score for this)

2) make it have a kerbal capacity of 36.21 (36)+100 points

3) any referances to tv/game/movies +34 and a bit points

4) stability....hard to determine but i am leaving it down to you guys to score in this catagory (maximum points 24.9999999)

5) profanity....well...yea....+5.3 points

6) stock +12 points

7) a video of your craft +20.4 points

Well thats about it ill get some screenshots of my abomination soon

hope it all goes well and have fun

-pup
